events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request due to sizing and fit problems with the jacket they ordered.
An agent specializing in refund cases has been assigned to handle the refund request for the ill-fitting jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 789456123, and the jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size. I'd like to return it and get my money back.
We can initiate your refund immediately once you ship the jacket back. I will send you the return label via email at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response and free return label. I will ship the jacket tomorrow and look forward to the refund.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the full refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear on your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
As you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we are now closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us!
